subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Cleveland Indians pitcher known as Fausto Carmona issued a tearful apology as he was released from prison in the Dominican Republic after his arrest on suspicion of using a false identity to play baseball in the United States.
snippet: The Cleveland Indians pitcher known as Fausto Carmona issued a tearful apology as he was released from prison in the Dominican Republic after his arrest on suspicion of using a false identity to play baseball in the United States.
